channel.title: Lear's stuff
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lear's stuff"

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: Sorry, I have none, and even if I did, I wouldn't trade them.

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded:
Hi lear dont need it anymore got 2 of them appraising 8 gems :P

But i need a make out mood

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded:
Sorry I haven't responded recently. I've been rather sick. If you still want to trade, let me know.

Also, updated list.

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: And temporarly i got 15 smokes and 2 supers

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: Hi Lear, the reason im so late is because i need to obtain good boy first but every time i try the mission he doesnt show up -.-

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: Cool. Bvs name is sikcool and ill try getting the items you need :P

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded:
Most of the tradable stuff is completely useless to me, just to let you know. What isn't useless, is just plain not worth the 100 appetite needed for an Avian Attraction Spray.

If you want Sham Rocks, I'm pretty much just interested in Super Potions, MOMEs, and Smoke Bombs for those, unless you can come up with something else that I haven't thought of.

MOMES > Smoke Bombs > Super Potions, btw.

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: Sorry, but the trade went through, so I no longer need a Lab Coat. Original post has been edited. Got another Ocelot rune, added Money Printer to my "want" list.

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: I've already got a trade offer for a Lab Coat. HOWEVER, that doesn't necessarily mean I won't take your offer. I'll let you know when I've gotten everything straightened out.

item.title: Re: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded: Offering Lab Coat for Mantis Ocelot and Wolf Runes.

item.title: Lear's stuff
item.content:encoded:
Have:

Hacksaw
Gold Potion x4

Polar Star
Fruits Basket
Halloween Items

Additional random stuff:

If you want anything from the list, make me a non-stupid offer and you can have it.

Sham Rock (7)
Love Love Paradise (1)
